DOC.brief_summary: Background : The incidence breech presentation pregnant woman 4 % . The situation treat two method . The first version fetus breech presentation head presentation , perform several way , , action call EXTERNAL CEPHALIC VERSION well Knee-Chest position pregnant mother second cesarean section . In study wish investigate Knee-Chest position effective ECV action result decrease need ECV . Hypotheses : According assumption , Knee-Chest position reduce need ECV action . Objectives : Investigate whether daily Knee-Chest position effective ECV . Methods : The investigator conduct `` randomized clinical trial '' study . Every pregnant woman breech presentation singleton week 28-32 randomly assign one two group . In first group woman perform daily Knee-Chest position week 32-37 . In week 37 investigator check via ultra sound successful version ( , woman would go ECV ) second group perform ECV without maternal Knee-Chest position . Every woman fill questionnaire include gynecological history detail regard degree persistence performance activity . At end process investigator analyze result come conclusion . Significance : With ECV number risk complication fetal distress , placental abruption , rupture membrane , amniotic fluid embolism damage uterus . The frequency complication 1 % -2 % . If discover Knee-Chest position effective ECV action , investigator recommend every patient persist position avoid ECV action risk entail .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficiency Between Practicing Knee Chest Position External Cephalic Version Cases Breech Presentation .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman breech presentation singleton week 2832 . Antepartum Hemorrhage . Premature rupture membrane . Placenta Previa . Oligohydramnios . Twin Pregnancy . Uterine malformation .
